      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OnlineBackup OnlineBackup.backup(String targetDirectory)
      Performs a backup into targetDirectory.
      OnlineBackup OnlineBackup.backup(String targetDirectory, boolean verification)
      Performs a backup into targetDirectory.

      Performs a backup into targetDirectory.

      Performs a backup into targetDirectory.

      Factory method for this class.
      static OnlineBackup OnlineBackup.from(String hostNameOrIp, int port)
      Factory method for this class.
      OnlineBackup OnlineBackup.full(String targetDirectory)
      Deprecated. 
      Use backup(String) instead.

      Use backup(String, boolean) instead

      Deprecated. 
      Use backup(String) instead.
      OnlineBackup OnlineBackup.incremental(String targetDirectory)
      Deprecated. 
      Use backup(String) instead.

      Deprecated. 
      Use backup(String, boolean) instead.
      OnlineBackup OnlineBackup.withTimeout(long timeoutMillis)
      Use this method to change the default timeout to keep the client waiting for each reply from the server when doing online backup.
